title: Stranded
description: I'm stranded on an island with five men, they like to share, and they're all falling for me.A holiday on an exotic island.Bridesmaid at my best friend's wedding.Followed by a week-long survival course paid for by work.It was supposed to be the perfect trip.Until our plane crashed on a remote tropical island in the Pacific.Six of us, me and five men.They're hunky, sexy, and handsome, but having five men fight over me is the last thing in the world I would have asked for.That is, until they learn how to share!Take my word for it, that's something every girl deserves to experience at least once in her life.Now, the only question is, which one will I fall in love with?From USA Today Bestselling author, Chance Carter, Stranded is a full-length reverse harem novel where meaningful relationships are formed between all six characters. The result is a scorching story that will stay with you long after you finish the last page.
author: Chance Carter
